title: Amidst Controversy, Famous Actress Becomes Meta AI’s Voice, Enabling English Conversations in Six Countries
description: In the world of technology, Meta AI has recently taken a significant step by incorporating a famous actress's voice into its artificial intelligence. Amidst controversies in courts and on social media, this initiative has become a major topic of discussion. - Patrika English News
content: Deepika Padukone New Voice Meta AI: Bollywood actress Deepika Padukone will no longer be limited to cinema, as she has now stepped into the world of technology. Deepika recently joined hands with Meta and has become the new English voice for Meta AI.... [2022 chars]

title: Honor is making a robot phone with camera that pops out using a tiny robotic arm
description: Honor has teased a new ‘robot’ phone that uses a robotic arm as a popout camera. The company claims that the robot camera arm uses Artificial Intelligence and advanced robotics to operate.
content:
Honor is seemingly planning a big launch with Artificial Intelligence. The Chinese phonemaker has teased a new ‘robot phone’ that has a mechanical arm to operate a popout camera.
The company posted a teaser on X, showing off how the robot arm will wo... [1751 chars]

title: Aligned Data Centers sold in $40B deal
description: A group including BlackRock, Nvidia and Microsoft is buying Aligned Data Centers in an approximately $40 billion deal in an effort to expand next-generation cloud and artificial intelligence infrastructure.
content:

title: Taiwanese chipmaker TSMC sees nearly 40% jump in its net profit thanks to the AI boom
description: Taiwan's leading computer chip maker, TSMC, said Thursday that its net profit surged nearly 40% in the last quarter, boosted by the surge in use of artificial intelligence.
content:

title: AI Boom Delivers Record Net Profit For Taiwan's TSMC
description: Taiwanese tech titan TSMC reported Thursday a forecast-busting record net profit for the third quarter on skyrocketing demand for microchips used to power iPhones and artificial intelligence.
content:

title: What students can gain from Google's $15B AI hub in Andhra Pradesh
description: India is emerging as a global AI powerhouse with Google announcing a $15 billion investment to build its largest artificial intelligence hub outside the US. The upcoming centre in Andhra Pradesh aims to drive innovation, sustainability, and hands-on learning opportunities for students and researchers alike.
content: India is set to host Google’s largest artificial intelligence (AI) hub outside the United States, a USD 15 billion investment project in Andhra Pradesh that will unfold between 2026 and 2030. This massive initiative aims to create state-of-the-art da... [3308 chars]

title: TSMC Q3 profit jumps 39.1% to record, beats expectations
description: TAIPEI (Reuters) -TSMC, the world's largest contract chipmaker, posted a 39.1% jump in third-quarter net profit on Thursday, beating market forecasts and hitting a record as it benefited from surging demand for semiconductors used in artificial intelligence applications.
content: TAIPEI (Reuters) -TSMC, the world's largest contract chipmaker, posted a 39.1% jump in third-quarter net profit on Thursday, beating market forecasts and hitting a record as it benefited from surging demand for semiconductors used in artificial intel... [445 chars]

title: Foxconn Teams Up with Nvidia on AI Factory Infrastructure Development
description: Taiwan-based manufacturing giant Foxconn announced that it will partner with U.S. artificial intelligence chip designer Nvidia Corp. to develop AI factory infrastructure.
content:
Taiwan-based manufacturing giant Foxconn announced that it will partner with US artificial intelligence chip designer Nvidia Corp. to develop AI factory infrastructure, as per a report by Focus Taiwan.
